content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (40.5, -80.5) and (42.5, -80.5)
- Additional Iron Chests at positions (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Additional Burner Inserters at positions (41.5, -78.5) and (41.5, -77.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-18.5, -48.5) and (-16.5, -48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-15.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-12.5, -49.5) and (-9.5, -49.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-14.5, -46.5) and (-14.5, -45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting from Full Chests
- Ensure that the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to extract items.

### Errors Due to Lack of Iron Ore in Inventory
- Maintain a sufficient supply of iron ore in the player inventory to ensure smooth transfer to furnaces.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Check the alignment and fuel status of inserters to ensure they are correctly positioned and fueled to pick up items.

### Errors with Local Variable 'x' Not Associated with a Value
- Ensure that all local variables are properly initialized and associated with values before attempting to use them in operations.
